QuestData.Title: Migrant Workers
QuestData.Description: $n, more recruits arrive at your garrison every hour. We will soon run out of food.$b$bI have made contact with Exarch Akama in hopes of securing rations from Elodor, the breadbasket of this valley. He has agreed, provided we supply labor for the harvest. Everyone wins.$b$bIf you agree with my plan, speak with Foreman Zipfizzle here in the courtyard - he has gathered together available laborers. Akama and I will escort them and meet you at Elodor, far to the east!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Foreman Zipfizzle in your garrison, then meet with the laborers outside of Elodor.
QuestData.RewardText: You made it!$b$bBut... one of our wagons didn't. Have you seen Maraad? He's still out there somewhere.
